April 5, 1981 D North East Midlands Contest (Third Section)
North East Midlands Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest North East Midlands Contest north-east-midlands-contest-third-section
The Pacemakers
Festival Hall, Kirkby-in-Ashfield, Nottinghamshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £75 and cup, 2nd £55 and trophy, 3rd £40. March contest - 1st Kirkby Colliery. 6 bands competed.
June 5, 2014, 9:34 a.m. April 5, 2017, 8:58 p.m.
1 Staveley Works Band M. Butler
2 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
3 Kingsway Printers Cleethorpes A. Weston
Unknown Result Creswell Colliery Band Mervyn Griffiths
Unknown Result Gresley Colliery Band Don Blakeson
